OpportunityFieldHistory.name: OpportunityFieldHistory
OpportunityFieldHistory.description: Represents the history of changes to the values in the fields of an opportunity.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

OpportunityId.description: ID of the Opportunity. Label is Opportunity ID.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The latest value of the field before it was changed.
